title: Avail Now - Ultra Modern + Pet Friendly 2 Bed w/Brick in Brookline!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302372845', 'Rent: $2,995 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date:', 'Avail Now or Aug 1st', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot/Cold Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Available for a lease starting anytime between July 16th and Aug 1st!', '(The apartment will be cleaned and painted between tenants!)', 'Open Concept + Pet-Friendly 2 Bedroom/1 Bath with an Exposed Brick interior featuring Ultra-Modern Finishes located in a professionally managed building on 81-83 Harvard St Brookline in Brookline Village, a few blocks from the heart of Coolidge Corner.', 'Easy commute to Longwood Medical, Downtown Boston, and around the corner from Walgreens.', 'This location offers the extraordinary convenience of numerous restaurants and entertainment options.', 'Considered A Very Walkable Neighborhood - Walk Score of 94 out of 100 Points', 'This listing features hardwood flooring throughout, a fully remodeled kitchen with white cabinets, quartz counters, and full-size stainless-steel appliances including a fridge, dishwasher, four-burner range, and a built-in microwave.', 'There is an exposed brick interior with an open concept living room and kitchen space, two medium-sized bedrooms, and a fully remodeled bathroom accented with modern finishes.', 'The rent includes heat and hot/cold water, and there are laundry facilities on each floor payable with a mobile app.', 'The common areas of the building have been remodeled to reflect the modernity of each unit.', 'Laundry facilities are easily accessible from your unit.', "The building is pet-friendly, and cats and various sizes of dogs are welcome with the property manager's approval.", '(There are breed restrictions)', 'There is a $50/month Pet Fee for having a dog.', '- Professionally Managed', '- Walk Score of 94 out of 100 Points', '- Located on the 2nd floor (One flight of stairs, no elevator)', '- (0.2 Miles)', "to Stop & Shop Supermarket, (0.4 Miles) to Trader Joe's, and (0.5 Miles) to Coolidge Corner", '- Pet-Friendly Building ($50/month Pet Fee for Dogs)', '- Short walk to Longwood Ave', '- The rent includes heat and hot/cold water', '- Oversized coin-op commercial laundry machines on each floor (Accepts Mobile Pay)', 'Public Transit', '- 8 minutes to the C-Line at Coolidge Corner Station', '- 6 minutes to the D-Line at Brookline Village Station', '- 1 minute to the 66 Bus Line', '- 4 minutes to the 65 Bus Line', 'null']
